Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. Considering its quality and uniqueness, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12000. We are confident that this investment will not only satisfy your needs but also exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
